text_block_list.text: (Chatter Chatter)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: —Um… The meeting place should be…

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Just a bit further and I'm there. 
I'm a bit late so I'll just run—

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: … Kyaa!!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much for helping me. This is where I'm supposed to meet up with some friends.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, the strap on your shoe is broken. 
… It's a little late, but are your plans for the day alright?

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text:
They're fine. 
These shoes are still suitable for walking.

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: Farewell.

Ah, there you are, Messiah. 
Wait… —Aruvu?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
… I see. So that's what happened. 
That must have been a bother to you.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: … God's sake. Just came here to buy some new running shoes. What a chore.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
I have nothing to say. 
Aruvu really helped me out.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Come now, I should pay you back for 
your kindness… What would you like?

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: … No thank you, I just happened to be in the area.

text_block_list.name: Air groove
text_block_list.text: Heh, don't say that. Are you free after this? How about we go and get a meal—

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: —I'm sorry.

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text:
I have something urgent to do, so I'll be off. 
… Pardon me.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Ah, hey!

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: (When… did I get here…)

text_block_list.name: Mother and Child
text_block_list.text:
—Mommy! Push harder! 
—Alright, alright. Make sure you're holding onto the swing, okay?

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: … A swing.

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: (I've never been… pushed before.)

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: (— At that time.)

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: (At that time, if only…)

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Heh, don't say that. Are you free after this? How about we go and get a meal together.

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: … If it's just a meal.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Alright, it's been decided.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
! 
This… is really delicious.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Mm… well, it ain't bad.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Aruvu, would you like a piece? I can give you one on your plate.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Oi, those strap-on weights look way too heavy for her. 
It ain't good to progess the load so much.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Is this weight more suitable for you? 
… Come now, let's at least try it.
(Drip)

text_block_list.name: Mother and Child
text_block_list.text:
—Mommy! It's raining! 
—Oh dear! Where's the folding umbrella…

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: —Tch.
On that day, as I arrived in front of the train station. I ran into Admire Groove, who was walking alone in the rain.
choice_data_list: If you don't have an umbrella, take mine.
… Did something happen? Are you alright?

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text:
… I'm fine. 
I was just on my way back to Tracen.
Even though I called out to her, she walked into the rain alone and vanished.
I'm fine, nothing happened.
text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: … If you'll excuse me.
I tried to reach out to her, but she walked into the rain alone and vanished.
